## EEG write up


[Download and complete the Lab Report template](Lab report - template.docx)

You should complete this template and submit it as your lab report. You will have to have first analysed the EEG data on this website in order to answer the questions on EEG analysis. 



## Written component

Your final Lab Report accounts for 100% of your grade for this module. Your Lab report should be submitted as one document on MyLearning [here](https://mdx.mrooms.net/mod/turnitintooltwo/view.php?id=3500311) (log in to MyLearning required)
